job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pDrop Party is a DTC entertainment brand that rewards highly devoted fandoms with premium merchandise and experiences Were here to allow fans to engage meaningfully in cultural moments during a time where our identities are increasingly defined by the products brands and experiences we buyppbrppWere a growing and diverse team of experienced operators nurturing a culture of collaboration openness and diversity of thoughtppbrppWe are giving preference to candidates that are Austin TX based or open to relocationppbrppstrongWhat youll be doingstrongpulliBuild and iterate on gamified commerce web experiences An engaging and entertaining experience is crucial for drops centered around a fandomliliGather requirements across a crossfunctional team and prioritize features effectively Our work spans a large breadth of fields and tech plays a large partliliOwning all stages of development process development testing implementation operational supportliliMust be a team player able to work within tight deadlines on multiple projects in a fastpaced environmentliliDeveloping for scale and reliability Traffic to drops are bursty and requires systems that wont fail in crucial momentsliulpbrppstrongExperiencestrongpulli23 years of React experience Understands react hooks functional components vs class components etcliliProficiency in frontend web development including styling animations component libraries etcliliCan handle complex logic required for gamification elementsliliFamiliarity with Nodejs Babel Webpack and other modern javascript toolingliliTypescript experience preferredliliDemonstrated strong technical judgment in conjunction with passionate customerfocusliulpbrppstrongBenefitsstrongpulliMedical Dental Vision Insurancelili3 weeks Paid Time Off amp Standard National HolidaysliliRemotehybrid work environment work from home as neededliliEquity Participationliul
